data.title: Other Things To See - Monona Terrace
data.meta_description: Check out the wonderful things you'd be able to experience and see at Monona Terrace, including the Otis Redding Memorial and exquisite panoramic views.
data.text:
Monona Terrace Community and Convention Center is open daily from 8:00am to 5:00pm except as noted below.

Rooftop hours Sunday-Thursday 8:00am-10:00pm Friday/Saturday 8:00am-midnight (closed during inclement weather)

Gift Shop Store Hours: Tuesday-Saturday: 11:00am-3:00pm

The building will be closed on the following dates in 2024: January 9-26 | March 31 | May 27 | June 19 | July 3-4 | September 2 | November 28-29 | December 24-25
